text:
No, it’s not. (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview#limitations|Docs>)
Also, <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions> is a great place to get a faster answer.
I’m pretty sure the IP ranges change quite frequently, so it’d be quite tricky to maintain. Last we asked, we were told that it wasn’t recommended and essentially impossible.
understood, thank you for your reply!
